item.description:
The last debate between GWH and the Chestertons was a lot of fun and a great success. This one will be on the Chestertons' turf, at St. John's High School. We're expecting a big crowd, and we'll want as many humanists there as possible.

Note also: This event is FREE, so bring your friends!
item.why: A debate between GWH and the Chesterton Society. The GWH side will be representated by David Miller, minister emeritus of the UU Church of Worcester, and David Niose, president of the American Humanist Association.
item.name: Debate: Is God Necessary for Morality?
